snippet: The Irish government has proposed legislation to allow abortion in cases where a threat exists to a woman’s life, including from suicide.
abstract: Irish government proposes legislation that will allow abortions in cases where threat exists to a woman's life, including from suicide.
lead_paragraph: The Irish government has proposed legislation to allow abortion in cases where a threat exists to a woman’s life, including from suicide.

headline.seo: Irish Government Proposes Allowing Abortion in Emergencies
headline.main: Irish Proposal Would Allow Abortions in Emergencies
headline.print_headline: Irish Proposal Would Allow Abortions In Emergencies
